Package net.explorviz.settings.server.resources

Class UserPreferencesResource

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.explorviz.settings.server.resources.UserPreferencesResource
  • @Path("v1/preferences")
@PermitAll
public class UserPreferencesResource
extends java.lang.Object
    Resource to access UserPreference, i.e. to handle user specific settings.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      UserPreferencesResource​(UserPreferenceRepository customSettingRepo, UserPreferenceService userPrefService, AuthorizationService authorizationService)
      Creates the endpoint.

      Access all preferences, possible filtered for a specific of a user.
      javax.ws.rs.core.Response resetToDefault​(java.lang.String prefId, javax.ws.rs.core.HttpHeaders headers)
      Deletes an UserPereference such that the default value applies again for the given user.
      UserPreference updatePref​(java.lang.String prefId, javax.ws.rs.core.HttpHeaders headers, UserPreference updatedPref)

      • UserPreferencesResource

        @Inject
public UserPreferencesResource​(UserPreferenceRepository customSettingRepo,
                               UserPreferenceService userPrefService,
                               AuthorizationService authorizationService)
        Creates the endpoint.
        Parameters:
        userPrefService - service for handling user preferences
        customSettingRepo - repository for user preferences

    • Method Detail

      • getPreferencesForUser

        @GET
@Produces("application/vnd.api+json")
@PermitAll
public net.explorviz.shared.querying.QueryResult<UserPreference> getPreferencesForUser​(@Context
                                                                                       javax.ws.rs.core.HttpHeaders headers,
                                                                                       @Context
                                                                                       javax.ws.rs.core.UriInfo uriInfo)
        Access all preferences, possible filtered for a specific of a user.
        Returns:
        a list of all user preferences for a given user.

      • resetToDefault

        @DELETE
@PermitAll
@Path("{id}")
public javax.ws.rs.core.Response resetToDefault​(@PathParam("id")
                                                java.lang.String prefId,
                                                @Context
                                                javax.ws.rs.core.HttpHeaders headers)
        Deletes an UserPereference such that the default value applies again for the given user.
        Parameters:
        prefId - the id of the preference to delete
        Returns:
        204 (not content) on success

      • updatePref

        @PATCH
@Produces("application/vnd.api+json")
@Path("{id}")
@PermitAll
public UserPreference updatePref​(@PathParam("id")
                                 java.lang.String prefId,
                                 @Context
                                 javax.ws.rs.core.HttpHeaders headers,
                                 UserPreference updatedPref)
        Updates the value of an existing setting.
        Parameters:
        prefId - the new preference content
        headers - the http headers (provided by jersey)
        updatedPref - the updated preference object
        Returns:
        the UserPreference object after it has been updated

      • createPreference

        @POST
@Consumes("application/vnd.api+json")
public UserPreference createPreference​(UserPreference preference,
                                       @Context
                                       javax.ws.rs.core.HttpHeaders headers)
        Creates a new custom setting.
        Parameters:
        preference - the custom setting
        Returns:
        HTTP 200 (OK) iff the custom setting was saved
